# PropertySetInfo.GetProperty method

Returns one of the defined properties in the set by name, if found

```csharp
public IPropertyTypeInfo? GetProperty(string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | the expected name, case sensitive |

## Return Value

null if not found, otherwise information about the property
